item.title: 法国称解雇鲍威尔将损害美元和美国经济
item.description: 法国财政部长埃里克-隆巴警告说，如果唐纳德-特朗普总统解雇美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔，他将把美元的信誉置于危险境地，并破坏美国经济的稳定。【原文：President Donald Trump would put the credibility of the dollar on the line and destabilize the US economy if he fired Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell, French Finance Minister Eric Lombard warned.】

item.title: 特朗普关税的第一波冲击波即将袭击世界经济
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普有效地向全世界宣布贸易战的三周后，新的经济预测和调查将指出最初的影响。【原文：Three weeks after US President Donald Trump effectively declared a trade war with the whole world, new economic forecasts and surveys will point to the initial fallout.】

item.title: 中国首个机器人马拉松选手绊倒、冒烟、摔倒
item.description: 周六，中国一些最优秀的仿人机器人接受了与人类马拉松选手比赛的挑战。其中一个机器人倒在了起跑线上。另一个的头掉了下来，在地上打滚。还有一个机器人倒地摔成了碎片。【原文：Some of China’s best humanoid robots took on the challenge of racing against human marathon runners on Saturday. One fell at the starting line. Another’s head fell off and rolled on the ground. And one collapsed and broke into pieces.】

item.title: 卡尼誓言增加赤字为基础设施和减税提供资金
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）承诺加深赤字以削减所得税，并增加基础设施支出，以减少该国对美国的依赖。【原文：Canadian Prime Minister Mark Carney is promising to run deeper deficits to cut income taxes and grow spending on infrastructure to reduce the country’s dependence on the US.】

item.title: 石油交易商从祈求波动到沉溺于波动
item.description: 直到最近，石油交易商们还在抱怨，要想从无精打采、区间震荡的原油市场中榨取利润几乎是不可能的。在经历了过去两周半的事件之后，这可能就是 "小心驶得万年船 "了。【原文：Until recently, oil traders complained that it was almost impossible to wring profits out of a listless and rangebound crude market. After the events of the past two-and-a-half weeks, this may have been a case of “careful what you wish for.”】

item.title: 投资者希望了解企业的支出超过收入的情况
item.description: 华尔街已经开始关注美国企业一年来最慢的季度盈利增长，转而关注一个很少引人注目的数字：资本支出。【原文：Wall Street is already looking past what’s expected to be Corporate America’s slowest gain in quarterly earnings in a year, instead focusing on a number that rarely captures the limelight: capital expenditures.】

item.title: ICICI 银行净收入增长 18%，超出分析师预期
item.description: 受利息收入增加的推动，印度第二大私人贷款机构 ICICI 银行有限公司公布的第四季度利润超出市场预期。【原文：ICICI Bank Ltd., India’s second-largest private lender, posted fourth-quarter profit that beat market expectations, driven by higher interest income.】

item.title: 中国最大贸易博览会上的出口商被告知不要提前离场
item.description: 在与美国的贸易冲突不断升级的背景下，中国最大的贸易博览会的主办方敦促出口商最大限度地利用机会吸引销售，因此不鼓励出口商提前闭馆或离场。【原文：Exporters at China’s largest trade fair have been discouraged from closing or leaving their stations early as organizers push them to maximize opportunities to attract sales amid an escalating trade conflict with the US.】

item.title: 台湾在特朗普加征关税的不确定性中延长卖空禁令
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的关税措施持续存在不确定性的情况下，台湾再次扩大了对卖空的限制，以抑制市场波动。【原文：Taiwan again extended its restrictions on short-selling to curb market volatility, amid ongoing uncertainty over Donald Trump’s tariff measures.】

item.title: 塔利班关系恶化，巴基斯坦副总理在喀布尔举行会谈
item.description: 巴基斯坦副总理穆罕默德-伊沙克-达尔（Mohammad Ishaq Dar）正在阿富汗进行为期一天的访问，在最近关系恶化的情况下与该国塔利班领导人举行会谈。【原文：Pakistan’s Deputy Prime Minister Mohammad Ishaq Dar is in Afghanistan for a day-long visit to hold talks with the country’s Taliban leaders amid a recent deterioration in ties.】

item.title: 全球经济图表：欧洲央行降息，加拿大按兵不动
item.description: 欧洲中央银行和加拿大央行选择了不同的政策应对不断升级的贸易战，同时都承认经济增长面临越来越大的风险。【原文：The European Central Bank and Bank of Canada opted for different policy responses to an escalating trade war, while both acknowledged growing risks to economic growth.】

item.title: 里夫斯承诺在下一份预算案中不提高英国财富税
item.description: 蕾切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）在秋季预算中誓言不会提高财富税，从而打消了财政大臣将提高税收以保护英国财政缓冲的猜测。【原文：Rachel Reeves vowed not to raise wealth taxes in her Autumn Budget, casting off speculation that the Chancellor of the Exchequer will increase levies to defend the UK’s fiscal buffer.】

item.title: 印度总统莫迪将于下周访问沙特阿拉伯以加强两国关系
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）将从周二开始对沙特阿拉伯进行为期两天的访问，这是他时隔六年后在全球经济动荡时期首次访问沙特阿拉伯。【原文：Indian Prime Minister Narendra Modi will embark on a two-day visit to Saudi Arabia from Tuesday, his first trip to the kingdom after six years amid a tumultuous period for the global economy.】

item.description:

item.title: 奇货可居：为什么五角大楼每年都无法通过审计（播客）
item.description: 奇货可居：为什么五角大楼每年都无法通过审计（播客）【原文：Odd Lots: Why the Pentagon Fails an Audit Every Year (Podcast)】

item.title: 澳大利亚反对党承诺恢复活羊出口
item.description: 澳大利亚反对党自由党-国家联盟（Liberal-National Coalition）承诺，如果在即将举行的联邦大选中掌权，将废除向海外市场出口活羊的禁令。【原文：Australia’s opposition, the Liberal-National Coalition, pledged to repeal a ban on live sheep exports to overseas markets if it takes power in the upcoming federal election.】

item.title: 中国船东寻求继续与美国就征税问题进行谈判
item.description: 中国船东协会表示，将继续就特朗普政府拟对中国船舶征税一事与美方及其他有关方面进行 "积极沟通"。【原文：The China Shipowners Association said it will continue to “actively communicate” with the US and other relevant parties about the Trump administration’s proposed levies on Chinese vessels.】

item.title: 力拓、必和必拓的 Resolution Copper 公司在美国获得快速通道资格
item.description: 美国政府授予世界两大矿业公司力拓集团和必和必拓集团在亚利桑那州的一个有争议的铜矿开采项目快速通道地位。【原文：The US government has awarded fast-track status to a controversial copper mining project in Arizona owned by the world’s two biggest mining companies, Rio Tinto Group and BHP Group.】

item.title: 路透社报道：特斯拉将推迟生产廉价电动汽车
item.description: 据路透社周五报道，特斯拉公司更经济实惠的汽车（包括精简版 Model Y）的量产上市已被推迟。【原文：The production launch of Tesla Inc.’s more affordable cars, including the stripped down version of the Model Y, has been delayed, Reuters reported Friday.】

item.title: 悉尼寄宿房屋因价格飙升而受到豪华建筑的威胁
item.description: 在悉尼帕丁顿富人区塞尔温街一个安静的拐弯处，两栋破旧的房屋矗立着，成为澳大利亚不断升级的住房危机的鲜明象征。【原文：On a quiet bend of Selwyn Street in Sydney’s affluent Paddington, two run-down homes stand as stark symbols of Australia’s escalating housing crisis.】

item.title: 晨星 DBRS 确认意大利评级为 BBB 且趋势向好
item.description: 晨星 DBRS 对意大利的债务评级保持积极展望，意大利仍有希望恢复到大流行病发生前的信用评级水平。【原文：Italy retained hope of returning to a credit rating level it last held before the pandemic, as Morningstar DBRS kept a positive outlook on its debt.】

item.title: S&P因经济实力而上调希腊评级
item.description: S&P全球评级公司上调了希腊的信用评级，这是一个多月来第三次上调评级，因为信用评估机构继续对希腊经济好转和债务前景改善表示欢迎。【原文：Greece’s credit rating was raised by S&P Global Ratings, the third upgrade in just over a month as credit assessors continue to welcome the country’s economic turnaround and improved debt outlook.】

item.title: 贝森特在马斯克权力斗争中接替代理国税局局长的职位
item.description: 财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）任命他的副手迈克尔-福尔肯德（Michael Faulkender）为下一任国内税收署代理专员，此前有报道称，该机构现任领导人加里-沙普利（Gary Shapley）是在埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的怂恿下就职的，贝森特并不知情。【原文：Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent appointed his deputy, Michael Faulkender, as the next acting commissioner of the Internal Revenue Service after reports the current leader of the agency, Gary Shapley, had been installed at the urging of Elon Musk without Bessent’s knowledge.】

item.title: 意大利有条件批准联合信贷银行收购 BPM 银行
item.description: 意大利政府将允许意大利联合信贷银行（UniCredit SpA）收购 Banco BPM SpA，但需满足一些条件。【原文：The Italian government will allow UniCredit SpA’s takeover bid for Banco BPM SpA to go ahead with some conditions, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 美联储主席戴利表示暂缓加息，但今年仍有可能降息
item.description: 旧金山联邦储备银行行长玛丽-戴利（Mary Daly）表示，由于存在通胀风险，美国央行维持利率的时间可能比预期的要长，但仍有可能在今年晚些时候降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of San Francisco President Mary Daly said the US central bank may hold interest rates longer than anticipated due to inflation risks, but could yet cut later this year.】

item.title: 斯塔默与特朗普讨论 "持续且富有成效的 "贸易谈判
item.description: 基尔-斯塔默爵士（Sir Keir Starmer）与唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）进行了通话，这是他宣布对从英国进口到美国的所有商品征收 10%关税后与美国总统的首次通话。【原文：Sir Keir Starmer has spoken to Donald Trump in the first call with the US President since he unveiled 10% tariffs on all goods imported to America from the UK.】

item.title: 波音公司开始返航运往中国航空公司的飞机
item.description: 随着中美两大经济体之间贸易战的升级，波音公司已开始将被中国航空公司客户拒绝的 737 Max 喷气式飞机运回美国。【原文：Boeing Co. has begun flying 737 Max jets that were refused by Chinese airline customers back to the US, as the trade war between the two biggest economies escalates.】

item.title: Match Group 首席技术官将在最新高管调整中卸任
item.description: Match Group 的首席技术和产品官 Will Wu 表示，他将于 5 月底离职，这是该交友应用公司一系列高管变动中的一员。【原文：Match Group’s chief technology and product officer Will Wu said he’s leaving his role at the end of May, adding to a slew of executive changes at the dating app company.】

item.title: 美国联邦储蓄委员会（CFPB）最新裁员计划被叫停，停摆努力受挫
item.description: 消费者金融保护局（Consumer Financial Protection Bureau）可能不会在全局范围内进行裁员，而华盛顿特区联邦法院正在权衡裁员是否会违反阻止该机构关闭的初步禁令。【原文：The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau may not proceed with agencywide job cuts, while a D.C. federal court weighs whether the terminations would violate a preliminary injunction blocking the agency from shutting down.】

item.title: 美国麻疹病例一周内增加 12%，24 个州达到 800 例
item.description: 美国已有 800 例麻疹确诊病例，比前一周增加了 12%，疫情已波及美国近一半的国土。【原文：The US has 800 confirmed cases of measles, a 12% increase from the week prior in an outbreak that has reached nearly half the country.】
